SummaryEnglish: During the Sengoku period, there are many factions constantly at war. One of these is led by a one-eyed man named Date Masamune and another by the imposing Takeda Shingen. The latter has a fiercely loyal subordinate named Sanada Yukimura who goes head to head against Date Masamune multiple times, but the battles between them tend to get interrupted. One such battle occurs when both men try to go after another leader named Imagawa, and they’re forced to break off their heated duel when Imagawa attempts to flee the scene with his body doubles. Yukimura and Masamune go after separate Imagawas, but all of the doubles are killed by a third party, and when their paths cross again, they are in front of the menacing Oda Nobunaga and his army. It was Nobunaga’s subordinates that killed those body doubles, and Nobunaga himself proceeds to kill the real Imagawa with a shotgun blast to the head.

1.TitleEnglish: Clash in the Inland Sea of Seto! Fugaku, the Great Fire-Belching Fortress of the Sea!
1.SummaryEnglish: Maeda Toshiie and Matsu visit Chousokabe Motochika, who governs Shikoku. They tell Motochika unreasonable demands from Nobunaga. Motochika rejects them and urges Maeda to betray Nobunaga. Meanwhile Keiji tries to convince Mouri Motonari to join the fight against Nobunaga, and is imprisoned as a result. Motochika and Motonari move against each other.

2.TitleEnglish: Dragon and Tiger - Oath of Victory! Souls Racing Towards a Blazing Future!
2.SummaryEnglish: The action is over-the-top as Date and Yukimura take on a group of disguised fighters. While Date may realize the masked men are actually Sasuke, Takeda, and Kojuro, Yukimura appears to have no clue.

3.SummaryEnglish: With the fall of Toyotomi Hideyoshi, Japan is once again plunged into chaos as his once subordinate Ishida Mitsunari seeks revenge against Date Masamune. Tokugawa Ieyasu, however, seeks a different path despite having once been under Toyotomi's command. Their fates soon intertwine with Sanada Yukimura's and other warriors' across the land. With a new unknown threat looming on the horizon, all warriors advance to Sekigahara for a final showdown, while a sinister plot unfolds in the background.

1.TitleEnglish: Azure and Crimson, a Fateful Encounter!
1.SummaryEnglish: Two of the mightiest warlords of ancient Japan, Takeda Shingen and Uesugi Kenshin, set aside their rivalry to unite against the forces of Date Masamune.

2.SummaryEnglish: Sanada and Date rush to claim the same prize: Imagawa’s head. A clash erupts between the two warriors, but before one can declare victory, their battle is interrupted by a horrifying presence.

3.SummaryEnglish: Free-spirited Keiji hopes to build an alliance against the threat of the Demon Lord. His visit with Uesugi ends on a promising note - but his meeting with Date Masamune leads to a battle.

4.TitleEnglish: Wavering Scarlet Flower – Loyalty that Brings Sorrow!
4.SummaryEnglish: The alliance is gathering strength; former rivals are united in the march to war against Oda. Unfortunately, the plan could be doomed without the cooperation and troops of Azai Nagamasa - Oda’s brother-in-law.

5.TitleEnglish: Brutal! The Righteous Battle of Nagashino and Shitaragahara!
5.SummaryEnglish: As entire armies stand poised to attack, Takeda and Uesugi offer Tokugawa a final chance to join forces against Oda - but once his loyalties are decided, a ruthless betrayal soaks the battlefield in blood.

6.TitleEnglish: Bonds Torn Asunder – Mortifying Retreat for Masamune!
6.SummaryEnglish: After he rises to defend the honor of the fallen Azai, Date Masamune orders his forces to retreat. However, Sanada is shocked to discover it might already be too late for the warrior to survive.

7.TitleEnglish: Marauding Villain! Two Dragons Duel in Earnest Under the Moon!
7.SummaryEnglish: Matsunaga takes three of Date’s men hostage and demands a ransom of rare and valuable weaponry. Katakura sets out to rescue the men - but he might not be able to do it alone.

8.TitleEnglish: Great Temple of Carnage! Kojuro in Dire Straits!
8.SummaryEnglish: Katakura, Sanada, and Sarutobi arrive with the treasures requested by Matsunaga, who betrays his word and attacks the hostages.

9.TitleEnglish: The Tiger of Kai Dies at Midaigawa!
9.SummaryEnglish: Oda’s army is on the move in the south, while his most lethal assassins strike the opposition leaders of the east. As Takeda and Uesugi fight for their lives, many loyal to the alliance meet their demise.

10.TitleEnglish: Yukimura Beyond Recovery?! The Date Army’s Tearful Disbandment!
10.SummaryEnglish: With Takeda and Uesugi injured, the remaining alliance leaders plot their final assault against Oda. Even though the situation looks bleak, Date and Sanada prepare to face their destinies.

11.TitleEnglish: Mitsuhide’s Betrayal! Honnoji Temple Goes Up in Flames!
11.SummaryEnglish: Date and Sanada arrive at Honnoji, but the showdown with evil will have to wait - the Demon Lord has set a trap. Meanwhile, a voice from beyond the grave encourages Ichi to take action against Oda.

12.TitleEnglish: Azuchi Castle Keep – A Fight to the Death for Tomorrow!
12.SummaryEnglish: The incredible final battle explodes at Azuchi Castle! With amazing power and determination, Date and Sanada unleash against the mighty Demon Lord.

1.TitleEnglish: Troubled Times Once Again! Advent of the Great Cataclysmic Warlord, Toyotomi Hideyoshi!
1.SummaryEnglish: Old rivalries resume at Kawanakajima as Sanada Yukimura battles Date Masamune and Takeda Shingen squares off against Uesugi Kenshin.  Meanwhile, the warlord Toyotomi Hideyoshi seeks ultimate domination in order to unify Japan.

2.TitleEnglish: The Lost Right Eye - The Dragon's Back Rent Asunder!
2.SummaryEnglish: Under attack from all sides, Date Masamune is at a severe disadvantage without his strategist. Meanwhile, Takeda Shingen and Sanada Yukimura are on the move and preparing to outflank Toyotomi.

3.TitleEnglish: Keiji vs. Toshiie! Tedorigawa Choked with Unequivocal Ideals!
3.SummaryEnglish: Uesugi Kenshin faces Maeda Toshiie's invading army! Meanwhile, in the north, Date Masamune prepares to engage Katakura Kojuro, but finds one more obstacle in his way.

4.TitleEnglish: The Ghost of Azuchi Castle?! The Lamentation and Howl of Evil that Assail Yukimura!
4.SummaryEnglish: Sanada Yukimura encounters someone he thought was long dead. Meanwhile, Keiji’s contemplation of the past leads to a decision, and Mori Motonari and Takenaka Hanbei conclude their negotiations.

5.TitleEnglish: Engraved Pledge! The One-Eyed Dragon vs The War God – Confrontation at Hitotoribashi!
5.SummaryEnglish: When Date’s path is blocked by Uesugi, he has a chance to reflect on the history he shares with Katakura. Meanwhile, Toyotomi prepares to invade Shikoku, and Sanada realizes that time is running out.

6.TitleEnglish: The Menacing Toyotomi-Mori Alliance! The Powerful Fist of Supremacy Cleaves the Sea!
6.SummaryEnglish: Toyotomi Hideyoshi takes on Chosokabe's seafaring fortress, the Fugaku. Meanwhile, Sanada is compelled to stray from his mission once again, and Keiji reunites with his aunt and uncle in Kaga.

7.TitleEnglish: To the Southernmost Land of Satsuma! A New Encounter as a Man for Yukimura!!
7.SummaryEnglish: While traveling to Osaka, Date encounters both Kai and Takeda. Meanwhile, Sanada is still shaken by Oyamada's death, but presses on to Satsuma in order to carry out his mission.

8.TitleEnglish: A Sad Reunion with a Friend - Memory of the Day Etched with Blinding Obsession
8.SummaryEnglish: Keiji reflects on the long history he shares with Toyotomi. Meanwhile, Sanada is allowed an opportunity to get to know Miyamoto and Shimazu better, and also gains some surprising insight into Mori.

9.TitleEnglish: Dragon and Ogre – Clash and Roar in Owari! The Combined Force of Date and Chosokabe
9.SummaryEnglish: Unaware of each other's identities, Date and Chosokabe clash! Meanwhile, Mori plots to further his own agenda while playing ally to Toyotomi - but Toyotomi and Takenaka have plans of their own.

10.TitleEnglish: The Young Tiger Restored! The Great Fortress Rebuilt - the Menace of the Sun Heads East!
10.SummaryEnglish: As Date and Chosokabe adjust their plans to attack Osaka, Mori plots to attack Toyotomi from the west. Meanwhile, Takeda and Uesugi attempt to outmaneuver Toyotomi in the east.

11.TitleEnglish: Toyotomi's Great Main Army Dashes For Supremacy! Earnest Keiji Drawns Sword In Heartbreak!!
11.SummaryEnglish: Sarutobi and Kasuga run into trouble after making their way into Osaka Castle. Meanwhile, Mori unleashes the true power of his mobile fortress, much to Sanada’s alarm.

12.TitleEnglish: Azure and Crimson Do-or-Die Battle! To the Sound of the Breeze at the End of the Fierce Struggle!
12.SummaryEnglish: Battles are raging all across Japan! As Date faces off against Toyotomi at Odawara Castle, Sanada fights Mori’s mobile fortress. Meanwhile, Katakura finally gets his showdown with Takenaka.

1.SummaryEnglish: As Toyotomi Hideyoshi prepares to take Odawara Castle, Date Masamune rides to stop him from taking over the country. And Tokugawa Ieyasu takes matters into his own hands when his plans are thwarted.

2.SummaryEnglish: Ishida Mitsunari mourns Toyotomi Hideyoshi's death. Tokugawa Ieyasu, now free to seek to rule the country on his own terms, faces off against Takeda Shingen. Meanwhile, Katakura Kojuro desperately seeks to return to Oshu.

3.SummaryEnglish: Tokugawa Ieyasu sets out to forge new bonds and alliances, which enrages Ishida Mitsunari and spurs him to take action. And one of the key players that everyone wants on their side is Saika Magoichi and her band of mercenaries.

4.SummaryEnglish: Striving to be the best commander of the Takeda that he can be, Sanada Yukimura goes on the warpath to confront Uesugi Kenshin, his lord's archrival. And Mori Motonari and Otani Yoshitsugu's plotting takes an interesting turn.

5.SummaryEnglish: The confrontation over Ishida Mitsunari sends Sanada Yukimura and Date Masamune in different directions. Meanwhile, Otani Yoshitsugu sends Chosokabe Motochika south on a recruiting mission.

6.SummaryEnglish: Sanada Yukimura and Date Masamune both do some soul-searching and consider the alliances they are respectively about to join. Chosokabe Motochika and Maeda Keiji find their assumptions about Tokugawa Ieyasu challenged.

7.SummaryEnglish: Sanada Yukimura is asked to aid Tenkai and the Oda to rescue Oichi from Tokugawa Ieyasu's clutches. Meanwhile, Ishida Mitsunari begins to get a hint of Otani Yoshitsugu's duplicitous scheming.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Eastern and Western forces gear up for an epic showdown at Sekigahara. Date Masamune and Sanada Yukimura reaffirm their rivalry. Ishida Mitsunari struggles with his responsibilities and the news of Tenkai's betrayal.

9.SummaryEnglish: The battle at Sekigahara gets underway as two seemingly monolithic armies collide, but things get complicated as the diverging interests of the individual generals begin to show.

10.SummaryEnglish: With a third party on the field of Sekigahara, East and West both turn their attentions to eliminating this distraction first.

11.SummaryEnglish: The preliminary duels play out at Sekigahara: Otani Yoshitsugu vs Katakura Kojuro, Date Masamune vs Ishida Mitsunari, Shimazu Yoshihiro vs Honda Tadakatsu, and Mori Motonari vs Chosokabe Motochika.

12.SummaryEnglish: The long-brewing showdown between Tokugawa Ieyasu and Ishida Mitsunari finally takes place. And when it ends, everyone must work out where to go from there.
